text: Aruba was first at the Olympic Games in 1988. They have been in each Summer Olympic Games since then. Aruba has not won an Olympic medal. Aruba has not been in any Winter Olympic Games. Previously Aruba competed under Netherlands Antilles, Kingdom of the Netherlands between 1952 until 1984. Aruba became a separate region of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in 1986. The National Olympic Committee for Aruba was formed in 1985 and recognized in 1986. ==Olympic games== Games Athletes Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Medals Medals Medals Games Athletes Seoul 1988 1 1 - - - - 0 0 0 Barcelona 1992 3 2 - 1 - - 0 0 0 Atlanta 1996 4 3 - 1 - - 0 0 0 Sydney 2000 4 2 2 - - - 0 0 0 Athens 2004 4 1 2 - - 1 0 0 0 Bejiing 2008 2 - 1 - 1 - 0 0 0 ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes *Netherlands Antilles at the Olympics ==References== ==Other websites == * Aruba profile at London2012.com Category:Aruba Category:Nations at the Olympics
